attributes.action: To raise the driving age limit for cars to 21 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To safeguard thousands of lives and to remove a large number of vehicles from the roads. This will also encourge use of public transport by people under 21 who are capable of doing so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
